H0.text: 0°F is the freezing point of water.

H1.text: 32°F is the freezing point of water.

H2.text: 50°F is the freezing point of water.

H3.text: 100°F is the freezing point of water.

A4.text: The melting point of ice at 1 atmosphere of pressure is very close to 0 °C (32 °F; 273 K); this is also known as the ice point.
